Package com.multi_threaded_http_web_server

Class HTTPResponse

java.lang.Object
com.multi_threaded_http_web_server.HTTPResponse
public class HTTPResponse
extends Object
The HTTPResponse class that handles, parses, and write the HTTP response appropriate to the output steam of the client depending on its HTTP request.
Author:
Hodaifa98.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static String CONTENT_CRLF
    A string denoting a double CRLF used to terminate the HTTP headers.
    static String CRLF
    A string denoting the standard Carriage Return (ASCII 13, \r ) Line Feed (ASCII 10, \n ).

    The main HTTPResponse constructor.

    Get the content length of the HTTP response's content.

    Get the HTTP method of the request.

    Get the HTTPResponse line fetched from the HTTPRequest.

    Get the HTTPResponse status code denoting the result of parsing the request.

    Get the HTTP version of the request.

    Get the requested resource's MEME type.
    HashMap<String,​String> getRequest_content_values()
    Get a HashMap of extracted content parameters and values, or null if none were provided in the HTTP request.

    Get a HashMap of extracted GET query string parameters and values, or null if none were provided in the HTTP request.

    Get the requested resource (with the full path) by the client from the HTTP server.
    String getResponse_headers()
    Get the HTTP response headers in a string, separated by CRLF.

    Check if the HTTP request is badly formatted, and not conforming to the standard HTTP request line: HTTP_METHOD /RESOURCE HTTP_VERSION.
    void writeHTTPResponse​(DataOutputStream dos)
    Write an HTTP response to the stream associated with the DataOutputStream instance provided in the parameters.

  • Field Details

    • CRLF

      public static final String CRLF
      A string denoting the standard Carriage Return (ASCII 13, \r ) Line Feed (ASCII 10, \n ). Used to end terminate HTTP status line, as well as HTTP headers in the standard HTML protocol. Per the official specification: rfc2616-sec4.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • CONTENT_CRLF

      public static final String CONTENT_CRLF
      A string denoting a double CRLF used to terminate the HTTP headers. An empty line separate the headers from any HTTP content body.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • HTTPResponse

      public HTTPResponse​(HTTPRequest request)
      The main HTTPResponse constructor. Takes an HTTPRequest instance and use its properties (such as method, MEME type, requested resource...) to construct the current HTTPResponse instance.
      Parameters:
      request - An HTTPRequest instance used to create the current HTTPResponse object.

  • Method Details

    • getHttp_version

      public String getHttp_version()
      Get the HTTP version of the request.
      Returns:
      A string denoting the HTTP version.

    • getHttp_method

      public HTTP_Method getHttp_method()
      Get the HTTP method of the request.
      Returns:
      An HTTP method enum object.

    • getRequested_resourse

      public String getRequested_resourse()
      Get the requested resource (with the full path) by the client from the HTTP server.
      Returns:
      A string denoting the request resource.

    • getMeme_type

      public String getMeme_type()
      Get the requested resource's MEME type.
      Returns:
      A string denoting the MEME type.

    • isIs_bad_request

      public boolean isIs_bad_request()
      Check if the HTTP request is badly formatted, and not conforming to the standard HTTP request line: HTTP_METHOD /RESOURCE HTTP_VERSION. Per the specification: rfc2616-sec5.
      Returns:
      A boolean denoting if the request is badly formatted.

    • getHttp_status_code

      public int getHttp_status_code()
      Get the HTTPResponse status code denoting the result of parsing the request.
      Returns:
      An integer denoting the HTTP status code.

    • getHttp_response_line

      public String getHttp_response_line()
      Get the HTTPResponse line fetched from the HTTPRequest. Used to parse and compose the appropriate HTTP response.
      Returns:
      A string denoting the HTTP response line.

    • getResponse_headers

      public String getResponse_headers()
      Get the HTTP response headers in a string, separated by CRLF.
      Returns:
      A string denoting the response headers.

    • getContent_length

      public long getContent_length()
      Get the content length of the HTTP response's content.
      Returns:
      A long denoting the content length of the response.

    • getRequest_GET_query_string_values

      public HashMap<String,​String> getRequest_GET_query_string_values()
      Get a HashMap of extracted GET query string parameters and values, or null if none were provided in the HTTP request.
      Returns:
      A HashMap of GET query string parameters and values.

    • getRequest_content_values

      public HashMap<String,​String> getRequest_content_values()
      Get a HashMap of extracted content parameters and values, or null if none were provided in the HTTP request.
      Returns:
      A HashMap of content parameters and values.

    • writeHTTPResponse

      public void writeHTTPResponse​(DataOutputStream dos) throws IOException
      Write an HTTP response to the stream associated with the DataOutputStream instance provided in the parameters.
      Parameters:
      dos - A DataOutputStream object used to write an HTTP response to the stream.
      Throws:
      IOException
